text:
 Daily diﬀerencing may be useful to adjust for the daily cycle in the data.
 Annual diﬀerencing may be useful to adjust for any yearly cycle in the data.
 Normalization may aid in reducing the variables with diﬀering units to the same scale.
There are many simple human factors that may be helpful in engineering features from the
data, that in turn may make speciﬁc days easier to forecast. Some examples include:
